title: Ghostly boots

properties.name: description
properties.value: Ghostly boots are pieces of members only armour worn in the footwear slot. Players can obtain a pair after speaking to Kharrim during the Curse of the Empty Lord miniquest. The boots, according to Rennard, were messenger boots that he used when he was alive.

Ghostly boots
Released26 July 2005 (Update)

Item ID6106

Ghostly boots are pieces of members only armour worn in the footwear slot. Players can obtain a pair after speaking to Kharrim during the Curse of the Empty Lord miniquest. The boots, according to Rennard, were messenger boots that he used when he was alive.

There are no requirements to wear and, when worn with the other pieces, the player appears 'ghostlike' (i.e.transparent). After initially obtaining the piece, the player can talk to any of the ghosts to get more pieces. A lost pair of boots can be purchased from Perdu for 15,000 coins. It can be stored in a magic wardrobe in a player owned house.

[[File:Ghostly boots detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Ghostly boots''' are pieces of [[members only]] [[armour]] worn in the [[footwear slot]]. Players can obtain a pair after speaking to [[Kharrim]] during the [[Curse of the Empty Lord]] [[miniquest]]. The boots, according to [[Rennard]], were messenger boots that he used when he was alive.

There are no requirements to wear and, when worn with the other pieces, the player appears 'ghostlike' (i.e.transparent). After initially obtaining the piece, the player can talk to any of the ghosts to get more pieces. A lost pair of boots can be purchased from [[Perdu]] for 15,000 coins. It can be stored in a magic wardrobe in a player owned house.
